This type of work enables her to generate an income to support her family as much as possible since she is single and has five children. When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says she likes the health training and the loans.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Martin

texts.es: El Sr. Martin tiene 43 años,  el se dedica a la agricultura sembrando variedad de vegetales como también maíz, papa y maní en su parcela que se encuentra en la comunidad de Vallecito de Tacuarembo,  este préstamo es el su primera secuencia dentro de la institución,  el Sr. Martin va a utilizar  este préstamo para la compra de semillas para siembra de maíz y maní   y lo que implica el preparado de la tierra, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es para obtener recursos  para la siembra y poder subsistir, el Sr. Martin enfrenta retos en su negocio que son las inclemencias del clima que en muchas ocasiones arruinan los sembradíos,  y utilizara los beneficios para mejorara la calidad de vida del cliente y de su familia ya que el corre con todos los gastos del hogar, es una persona  responsable y trabajador se siente agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado, una vez que cosecha sus productos los comercializa en el mercado de la comunidad directamente del productor al consumidor.
texts.en:
Martin, age 43, is a farmer.  He grows a variety of vegetables like corn, potatoes, and peanuts on his land.  His land is located in the Vallecito de Tacuarembo community.  This loan is his first cycle within the institution.  Martin will use this loan to buy seeds to plant corn and peanuts and to buy what is needed to prepare the land.

His reason for requesting this loan is to get resources for sowing and to be able to survive.  Martin faces the challenges of inclement weather in his business.  Many times it destroys his crops.  He will use the profits to improve his quality of life and that of his family.  He covers all of the household expenses.  He is a responsible and hard-working person.

He is grateful to the institution for the provided support.  Once he harvests his products, he sells them directly from the producer to the consumer at the community market.

loans.use: to buy seeds to plant peanuts and corn.

loans.name: Efua

texts.en:
Although she has received no prior formal education, Efua is an entrepreneur. She specializes in selling sugarcane in Akatakyiwa (near Cape Coast). She has been involved in this enterprise for three years. Efua is married and has five children. Her husband works as a farmer. The proceeds from her business normally go towards helping her husband cover the family’s general expenses and paying their children’s school fees. 

Efua wants to use her loan to increase her current inventory levels, hence allowing her to sell greater quantities of sugarcane. In the long term, Efua plans to reinvest future profits into her business, thus helping her expand and meet the needs of rising customer demands.

loans.use: to increase her current inventory levels, hence allowing her to sell greater quantities of sugarcane.

loans.name: Sabougnouma Group

texts.fr:
Mariées majoritairement dans des familles traditionnelles avec une moyenne d’âge de 41 ans et 4 enfants, les cinq femmes du groupe SABOUGNOUMA habitent toutes dans le quartier Bougoula hameau de la ville de Sikasso (3ème Région administrative du Mali) et se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et de leurs activités professionnelles.  
Elles  font de la vente de savon, de riz, de la fabrication  et vente de soumbala. 
Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe intègrent Soro Yiriwaso et sont à leur 10ème  cycle de prêt solidaire.
Madame SANATA, debout au milieu, compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter, 4 sacs de riz  Elle s’approvisionne sur place  à Bougoula et ensuite fait la, à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. Madame SANATA compte réaliser avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel moyen de  45.000 FCFA qui sera utilisé, pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et prendre en charge certains besoins du foyer
texts.en:
Most of them married in traditional families and averaging 41 years of age and four children each, the five women of the group SABOUGNOUMA all live in the Bougoula Hameau district in Sikasso City (3rd administrative region of the Republic of Mali). The women know one another through ties of kinship and community and through their professional work. They buy and sell soap and rice, and they make and sell 'soumbala' (fermented seeds or beans used in cooking).

With the goal of increasing their business capital, the group members joined the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso and are now on their tenth solidarity loan cycle.

Ms. SANATA, who is standing in the middle in the photo, intends to use her loan to purchase 4 sacks of rice. She gets her supplies locally in Bougoula and then makes her sales to men and women customers. 

With this loan, Ms. SANATA plans making an average monthly profit of 45,000 francs CFA that will be used for reinvesting in her business and meeting certain household needs.

loans.use: to purchase rice

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a greater quantity of maize.

loans.name: Hiyam

texts.en:
Hiyam is a 57-year-old Lebanese widowed woman living with her only child. After the death of her husband, Hiyam became the main person responsible for her child and had to work without stop to support him financially and well. She has been producing food since 2007. She works from her home and she is well-known for her delicious and tasty cooking.

Today, she is in need of a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l to repair her oven, purchase a microwave and a new refrigerator. She states that these purchases will certainly strengthen her business and will allow her increase her productivity by a large percentage as well as her income. Hiyam is in real need of the loan and she says that she will apply for added loans in the future as she thinks of opening a small bakery next to her house.

loans.use: to repair her oven, purchase a microwave and a new refrigerator.

loans.name: Floresminda

texts.es: Floresminda, de 52 años de edad, está casada y tiene 7 hijos los cuales ya son mayores de edad. Actualmente vive con su esposo en su casa propia. Floresminda está dedicada al sector agrícola, específicamente se dedica a la siembra de cacao por la amplia demanda que tiene este cultivo entre la población de su sector. Tiene un terreno propio de 2 hectáreas en el que ha establecido la siembra de este cultivo, sin embargo debido a la demanda actual, ha optado por alquilar otras áreas de terreno en donde piensa establecer este producto y consolidar su negocio. Trabaja en este sector desde hace 20 años con la ayuda de su esposo. Una vez que obtiene sus productos cosechados los vende en el mismo campo o traslada todo al mercado para continuar con la venta. Le esta yendo muy bien, aunque algunas veces el extenuante sol le hizo pensar en desistir de su trabajo, sin embargo a sabido acomodarse a la situación y ahora realiza su trabajo con buenos resultados y con la mejor actitud por delante. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 1500 soles y está agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado comprará una herramienta eléctrica nueva llamada motosierra , el cual sera usado para acondicionar una hectárea más de cacao.
texts.en:
Floresminda is 52 years old, married, and has seven children who are all now adults. She lives with her husband in their own home.

Floresminda works in agriculture – specifically she grows cacao because of the significant demand for this crop among the population where she lives. She has her own field of two hectares where she has established her cacao trees. However, because of the high current demand for this product, she has rented other fields where she plans to establish cacao trees and consolidate her business. She has worked in this area for 20 years with the help of her husband. When she harvests her crops, she sells them in the field where they grow, and transports what remains to a market to continue to offer them for sale. She says her business is going well for her, although she says that sometimes in the past the exhausting sun made her think of not continuing with this work. However, she says that she has learned how to adapt to the situation and now she does her work with good results and a positive outlook for the future.

Floresminda is requesting a loan of 1500 PEN and is grateful for the financial support to move ahead with her business. She promises to punctually make her payments. With the loan she will buy a new type of chainsaw that she will use to prepare an additional hectare of cacao.

loans.use: to buy a chainsaw.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to increase her current inventory levels, hence allowing her to sell greater quantities of gari, sugar, and groundnut.

loans.name: Kotognogontala Group

texts.fr:
Mariées majoritairement dans des familles traditionnelles avec une moyenne d’âge de 44 ans et 5 enfants, les six femmes du groupe KOTOGNOGONTALA habitent toutes dans le quartier Bougoula hameau de la ville de Sikasso (3ème Région administrative du Mali) et se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et de leurs activités professionnelles.  
Elles  font de la vente de savon, d’ustensile, de riz, de la fabrication  et vente de soumbala. 
Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe intègrent Soro Yiriwaso et sont à leur 11ème  cycle de prêt solidaire.
Madame AWA, debout en troisième position de la droite vers la gauche, compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter, des ustensiles de cuisine soit environs une vingtaine de tasse plastique, 35 louches en aluminium et le reste pour l’achat des assiettes.  Elle s’approvisionne à  Sikasso et à Bougoula et ensuite fait la vente à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. Madame AWA compte réaliser avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel moyen de  50.000  francs CFA qui sera utilisé, pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et prendre en charge certains besoins du foyer
texts.en:
Most of them married in traditional families and averaging 41 years of age and four children each, the five women of the group SABOUGNOUMA all live in the Bougoula Hameau district in Sikasso City (3rd administrative region of the Republic of Mali). The women know one another through ties of kinship and community and through their professional work. They sell soap, utensils, and rice, and they make and sell 'soumbala' (fermented seeds or beans used in cooking).

With the goal of increasing their business capital, the group members joined the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso and are now on their 11th solidarity loan cycle.

Ms. AWA, who is standing third from the right in the photo, intends to use her loan to purchase kitchen utensils, which may include about 20 plastic cups, 35 aluminum ladles, and some plates with what is left. She gets her supplies in Sikasso and in Bougoula and then makes her sales to men and women customers. 

With this loan, Ms. AWA plans making an average monthly profit of 50,000 francs CFA that will be used for reinvesting in her business and meeting certain household needs.

loans.use: to purchase kitchen utensils

loans.name: Monica

texts.en:
Monica is a small-scale agrochemical seller in Soba (near Hohoe). She has had some form of formal education as she is a middle-school graduate. She is married and has five children. Her husband is a farmer. Monica has been working as a agrochemical seller for close to 21 years. Her income is used to help her husband pay the utility bills and their children’s school fees. 

She plans on using her loan to purchase an increased quantity of agrochemicals, thus allowing her to meet the rising customer demands in her community. She hopes to use the profits from her enterprise to fulfill her dream of owning an agrochemical stand, hence helping her sell from a fixed location in the future.

loans.use: to purchase an increased quantity of agrochemicals.

loans.name: Mahmasharif

texts.ru: Махмашариф деятельный человек, всегда старающийся улучшить условия проживания семьи. Он женат и имеет троих детей, с которыми он проживает в районе Дж.Руми. Ему 46 лет. Старший сын Махмашарифа работает на заводе по производству извести. Жена Махмашарифа занимается домашним хозяйством, в их хозяйстве имеется одна дойная корова. Так как в сельской местности прибыльным видом бизнеса являетcя выращивание крупногo рогатого скота Махмашариф решил заняться именно этим видом бизнеса. Он собирается выращивать коров и телят для последующей их реализации. У него имеется стартовый капитал на сумму 500 сомони (TJS), а также коровник размером 25х4 метра. Махмашариф запрашивает кредит в размере 2000 долларов США. Он на сумму кредита и своего сбережения планирует купить 6 голов коров и телят и их корм. За счет полученной прибыли он хочет устроить свадьбу дочери, которая находится на выданье.
texts.en: Mahmasharif is an active person, who always tries to improve his family's living conditions.  He is married and has three children, with whom he lives in the J. Rumy district.  He is 46 years old.  Mahmasharif's oldest son works at a chalk manufacturing plant.  Mahmasharif's wife is involved in household work; they have one dairy cow in their household.  Because raising cattle is a profitable business in a rural area, Mahmasharif decided to get involved precisely in this type of business.  He plans to raise cows and calves for subsequent sale.  He has a starting capital in the amount of 500 somoni (TJS) and also a 25x4 meter cowshed.  Mahmasharif is requesting a loan in the amount of 2000 US dollars.  He plans to buy six heads of cows and calves, and feed with the loan amount and his savings.  He wants to use the resulting profit to hold a wedding for his daughter, who is ready to get married.

loans.use: to buy six heads of cows and calves, and feed to start an animal husbandry business

loans.name: Surayo

texts.ru: Сурайё жительница района Рудаки занимается выпечкой. Ей 25 лет. У нее есть муж и двое маленьких детей. Сурайё с 2008 года занимается выпеканием печенье и тортов для продажи.  При дворе ее дома построена маленькая пекарня, где Сурайё занимается там выпечкой. Каждый день она печет разные вкусные печенье и торты, и в тот же день распределяет их по магазинам и супермаркетам. Ее продукция очень хорошо расходится и день за днем спрос на них увеличивается. Так как домашняя свежая выпечка всегда в спросе у покупателей. Сурайё необходимо увеличить свою продукцию. Поэтому она обратилась за кредитом для закупа муки, маргарина, сахара, яиц, грецких орехов для выпечки большего количества печенье и тортов на продажу. Прибыль с продажи она планирует потратить на расширение бизнеса.
texts.en: Surayo is a resident of the Rudaki district and involved in baking.  She is 25 years old.  She has a husband and two small children.  Surayo has been involved in baking cookies and cakes for sale since 2008.  A small bakery, where Surayo is involved in baking, was built in the yard of her house.  She bakes various delicious cookies and cakes every day and distributes them among stores and supermarkets the same day.  Her products sell very well, and the demand grows day-after-day.  Because fresh home baked goods are always in demand among customers, Surayo needs to increase her production.  This is why she requested this loan to buy flour, margarine, sugar, eggs and walnuts for baking a large quantity of cookies and cakes for sale.  She plans to spend the profit from sales on expanding her business.

loans.use: to buy flour, margarine, sugar, eggs and walnuts for baking a large quantity of cookies and cakes for sale

loans.name: Ansica

texts.es:
Ansica tiene 35, está casada y vive en su casa propia  junto su esposo y sus 3 hijos. 
Ansica se dedica a la venta de dulces en el frontis de un colegio de su barrio. Se inició en éste negocio hace más de 05 años con un capital propio, y hasta el momento lo realiza sola.
Se decidió empezar con éste negocio para apoyar con los gastos del hogar y así brindarles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.
Esto será el primer préstamo con Kiva. Está agradecida al saber que contará con un apoyo financiero para continuar con su negocio. 
Con el monto de 300 nuevos soles los invertirá en la compra de mercadería para su negocio, como chocolates, chicles, galletas entre otros.
texts.en:
Ansica is 35 years old, married, and lives in her own home with her husband and three children. She works selling candies and sweets in front of a school in her neighborhood. She started this business more than five years ago with her own capital, and during all this time she has done it by herself. She decided to start this business to help out with household expenses and to provide a better quality of life for her children.

This will be Ansica’s first loan with Kiva. She says that she is grateful to know that she will be able to count on financial support to continue with her business. With the requested amount of 300 PEN, she will buy merchandise for her business, such as chocolates, gum, cookies and others.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her business, such as chocolates, gum, cookies and others.

loans.name: Nyame's Group

texts.en:
Nyame's Group consists of seven women who show great determination in their income-generating activities. With extensive experience, they have been able to regulate the progress of businesses through the acquisition of loans from ID Ghana. This is their fifth loan cycle with ID Ghana and the first loan request from Kiva.

Akua is the featured borrower for this group. She is a 38-year-old, married mother of two children, a boy and a girl. She operates a cool store where she sells frozen fish and she buys her fish from the harbor. She sells these items for instant cash payment.

She will use this loan to buy about four cartons of fish, so that she can sell to customers.

The profits earned will allow her to help with her family’s daily expenses and to support part of her children’s tuition fees.

The other members of the group sell beans, rice, millet, charcoal, provisions, foodstuffs, and vegetables.

loans.use: to buy about four cartons of fish, so that she can sell to customers.

loans.name: Cirilo

texts.es: El Sr. Cirilo tiene 56 años, casado, el  es agricultor, se dedica a la siembra de tomate y frutales en su parcela que se encuentran en la localidad de Guaracal,  este préstamo es su novena secuencia dentro de la institución, El Sr. Cirilo va a usar este préstamo para la compra de semillas para la siembra de tomate  y el mantenimiento de sus cítricos para la posterior cosecha, El Sr. Cirilo enfrenta retos en su negocio que son mejorar su calidad de vida y va a utilizar los beneficios para aumentar su producción,  El Sr. Cirilo vende sus productos en el mercado de la localidad directamente del productor al consumidor, se siente feliz y agradecido por la oportunidad que le brindan ya que esta es su única actividad desde hace varios años que le permite mantenerse y mantener a su familia, los anteriores prestamos lo utilizo siempre en la siembra y preparado de la tierra .
texts.en:
Cirilo, 56, is married and works in agriculture growing tomatoes and fruit on his parcel located in Guaracal.  This loan is his ninth sequence in the institution and Cirilo will use this loan to buy seeds to grow tomatoes and for care of his citrus crop in the next planting season.  

The business challenge Cirilo faces is improving his quality of life and he will use profits to increase production.  Cirilo sells his products in the local market directly to the consumer.  He feels happy and grateful for the opportunity he’s being given because this is the only activity he’s had for years that makes it possible for him to support himself and to support his family.  He always used previous loans for his crops and to prepare the soil.

loans.use: to buy tomato seeds and to care for citrus crops

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Delia

texts.es: La señora Delia tiene 37 años de edad, ella vive en Tiraque actualmente ella se encuentra concubinada, Delia tiene un lote agricola donde tiene la plantacion de palmito y trabaja como jornalera.  Delia vivia en el departamento de cochabamba hace como 10 años atrás ella tuvo que venirse a Tiraque porque no tuvo ingresos suficientes para poder mantener a su familia, ella se volvió a levantar  junto a su pareja, tomaron un nuevo rumbo en su camino ya que empezo de cero.  El préstamo que solicita Delia es para la compra de una motosierra y motorrozadora ya que de esa manera podrá mantener mejor su produccion y poder ayudar a sus hijas a terminar alguna carrera, sueña con un futuro mejor para sus hijas ya que ella no pudo terminar una carrera.
texts.en: Delia is 37 and currently lives with her partner in Tiraque.  She has a plot of land where she grows palm hearts and works as a labourer.  Delia used to live in Cochabamba department but, ten years ago, she had to come to Tiraque because she did not earn enough to support her family.  She got back on her feet along and, along with her partner, took a new direction because she started from square one.  Delia will use the loan she is applying for to buy a chainsaw and a power weeder which will enable her to maintain her crops better and allow her children to study for a career. She dreams of a better future for her children because she was not able to finish her education.

loans.use: to buy a chainsaw and a power weeder

loans.name: Carmen Luz

texts.es: Carmen comenzó su negocio hace 25 años, con un préstamo familiar decidió emprender en el negocio de venta de artículos de uso personal, poco a poco fue aumentado sus ventas hasta legar a tener bastantes clientes, con el préstamo va a comprar uniformes, su sueño es que todos sus nietos terminen la universidad y sean profesionales de éxito.
texts.en: Carmen started her business 25 years ago.  She used a family loan to start selling personal use items and gradually increased sales until she had quite a few customers.  She wants to use the loan to buy uniforms.  Her dream is that all her grandchildren complete university and become successful professionals.

loans.use: to buy uniforms.

loans.name: Celestine

texts.en:
Celestine is married to a peasant farmer. She uses her income to help her husband pay the household expenses as well as save for a rainy day.

A junior high school graduate, Celestine currently prepares and sells ‘Kenkey’ (a traditional Ghanaian staple dish that is made from corn dough and is wrapped in banana leaves). She normally sells her ‘Kenkey’ in Soba (near Hohoe). With over 3 years of experience in this trade, Celestine sees an opportunity to expand her enterprise further. Nevertheless, she does not have the working capital necessary to increase her ‘Kenkey’ preparing capacity. Thus her loan will be used to buy more maize, indirectly helping her boost her overall sales.

Celestine wants to make her business self-sustainable as soon as possible. As a result, she plans to channel the new profits from her expanded business back into her enterprise.

loans.use: to buy more maize, indirectly helping her boost her overall sales

loans.name: Philothea

texts.en:
Philothea is a widow and has 1 child. After successfully graduating from middle school, Philothea is now an established businesswoman. She sells African fabric and clothes in Dafonu (near Hohoe). She has been actively involved in this business for about 11 years. As the sole breadwinner in the family, Philothea uses her income to provide for the entire family.

Philothea will use the loan to purchase increased amounts of African fabric and clothes, thus aiding her to improve her overall sales. With the new profits from her expanded business, Philothea plans to diversify the type of products that she sells, hence adapting to changing customers preferences.

loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of African fabric and clothes, thus aiding her to improve her overall sales

loans.name: Memuma

texts.en:
Memuma is single and has 2 children. Even though she did not receive any formal education, Memuma is a successful businesswoman. She prepares and sells ‘Kenkey’ (a traditional Ghanaian staple dish that is made from corn dough and is wrapped in banana leaves) for a living. She normally sells her ‘Kenkey’ in Akatakyiwa (near Cape Coast). She has been actively involved in this business for about 2 years.

As the sole breadwinner in the family, Memuma uses her income to provide for the entire family. Memuma will use the loan to purchase increased amounts of maize, thus aiding her to improve her overall sales. With the new profits from her expanded business, Memuma plans to further diversify the type of products that she sells, hence adapting to changing customer preferences.

loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of maize, thus aiding her to improve her overall sales

loans.name: María Luisa

texts.es: La cliente reside en la ciudadela La Aurora en la ciudad de Machala.  Empezó a laborar como modista para una empresa pero luego tuvo la posibilidad de adquirir 2 máquinas de coser con lo que inició su negocio.  Básicamente confeccionaba ropa para los clientes que atendía en su anterior trabajo.  Con el préstamo obtenido, comprará material de costura para su negocio.  Es solteram no tiene hijos y labora de manera individual todos los días.
texts.en:
The client who resides in the neighborhood of La Aurora in the city of Machala.  She began working as a seamstress for a company, but later she acquired two sewing machines for starting her own business.  Essentially she produces clothes for the same customers she attended to from her previous job.  

With the loan she received, María will buy sewing materials for her business.  She is single and has no children.  María works by herself every day.

loans.use: to buy sewing materials for her business.

loans.name: Roxana

texts.es:
Roxana tiene 33 años, está divorciada y vive en la casa de sus padres junto su hijo de 1 año. 
Roxana se dedica a la venta de zapatos, ropas de damas y caballeros y productos de belleza femeninos, y atiende de manera cordial y amable a sus clientes, dedicándose a este negocio desde hace 05  años.
Le gusta su negocio pues le genera un ingreso económico y le permite tener una ocupación y sentirse una persona productiva, teniendo los deseos de convertirse en una prospera empresaria, tiene planes de hacer crecer su negocio.
Esto será su primer préstamo con Kiva. Está muy contenta de  saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio. 
Con el monto de 400 nuevos soles los invertirá en la compra de un mayor número de mercadería para tener un stock disponible para la venta como zapatos y productos de belleza.
texts.en:
Roxana, 33, is divorced living with her one-year-old son in her parents’ house.  Roxana sells shoes, women’s and men’s clothes and women’s beauty products.  She treats her customers cordially and kindly and has been in business for five years.

She likes her business because it generates income and allows her to have an occupation and feel productive.  She wants to become a prosperous businesswoman and has plans for her business’ growth.

This will be her first Kiva loan.  She’s very happy to know that she’ll have financial support because she’ll feel more confident about making business progress that way.

She will use the 400 new soles to buy a larger amount of merchandise to have stock available like shoes and beauty products to sell.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase an increased quantity of garden eggs, tomatoes, tin fishes, fried fish, maggi cubes, and tin tomatoes, thus allowing her to meet rising customers’ demands.

loans.name: Benkadi   2 Group

texts.fr:
Les 10 membres du groupe  Benkadi 2 sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 45 ans, 6 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles traditionnelles à BOUGOURA, un des villages de la commune de YANGASSO cercle de SAN, 4ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur 5 eme prêt avec l’institution, les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est  l’arachide  avec SALI,  1 ère assise  de la gauche vers la droite   sur la photo.
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, des semences, des petits matériels agricoles et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir 1,5 hectare. 
La production sera vendue au niveau du village et à Kimparana, après la récolte, à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice de 160 000FCFA en fin de campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The ten members of the Benkadi 2 group are married women who are, on average, 45 years old with six children each. They all live in traditional families in Bougoura, one of the villages of the Yangasso commune, in the Cercle of San (fourth administrative region of Mali). 

They have joined the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso in order to successfully carry out their farming activities during the rainy season.  This is their fifth loan with the institution, and their previous loans were duly repaid.

Sali, a member of the group, grows groundnuts.  In the photo, she is in the front row, first from the left.

Sali plans to use her loan to  buy some farm inputs, seeds, small agricultural equipment, and to cover the cost of plowing to maintain 1.5 hectare (3.7 acres) of land. 

After the harvest, she will sell her crop in her village and in Kimparana, to a customer base consisting of men and women.

She is expecting to make a profit of 160,000 CFA francs at the end of the growing season.  This profit will allow her to repay her loan and to help her husband with the daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs, seeds and small agricultural equipment, and to cover the cost of plowing.

loans.name: Beishekan

texts.ru: Бейшекан, 60 лет, вдова, мать четверых детей (2 сына и 2 дочери). Образование-среднее. Бейшекан на протяжении 30 лет занимается животноводством и полеводством, начав этот бизнес с 10000 сом (KGS). Бейшекан имеет практический опыт в животноводстве  и полеводстве, а также знает теорию по разведению скота в домашних условиях. Благодаря своей трепетной работе и ответственности Бейшекан на сегодняшний день имеет хорошее хозяйство: 4 дойные коровы, 2 теленка, 2 кобылы и 11 овец, а также обрабатывает 0,50 ГА поливной земли, на которой она ежегодно сажает:  клевер, кукурузу и картофель. Ежемесячная прибыль ее семьи составляет 15000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Бейшекан обратилась в Микрофинансовый Банк «Бай-Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 40 000 сом (KGS) на покупку телят. Доходы от кредита Бейшекан планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение количества скота, а также в будущем хочет построить дополнительный хлев для скота.
texts.en: Beishekan is 60 years old, a widow and a mother of four children (two sons and two daughters).  She has a secondary education.  Beishekan has been involved in animal husbandry and farming for 30 years, having started this business with 10,000 som (KGS).  Beishekan has a practical experience in animal husbandry and farming and also knows the theory of breeding livestock in home conditions.  Thanks to her sensitive work and responsibility, today Beishekan has a good business, containing four dairy cows, two calves, two horses and eleven sheep, and also works on 0.50 hectares of irrigated land, where she annually plants clover, corn and potatoes.  The family's monthly profit amount to 15,000 som (KGS).  In order to further develop her business, Beishekan requested a loan in the amount of 40,000 som (KGS) from the Microfinance Bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" to buy calves.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into a continued increase of livestock quantities and also wants to build an additional cowshed for the livestock.

loans.use: to buy calves

loans.name: María Cristina

texts.es: La cliente reside en la ciudad de Machala, su actividad comercial es la venta de comida en el muelle.  Labora junto con su hija quien le ayuda en la elaboración de la comida.  Es soltera, su hija ya es mayor de edad.  En el futuro tiene la idea de tener un restaurante con local propio en el centro de la ciudad.  Por ahora necesita el crédito para invertir en implementos y la comida(ingredientes) para su negocio.
texts.en: The client lives in the city of Machala.    Her commercial activity is selling food on the pier.  She works alongside her daughter who helps her prepare the food.  She’s single and her daughter is an adult.  In future, she has the idea of opening a restaurant in a locale of her own downtown.  For now, she needs the loan to invest in utensils and ingredients for her business.

loans.use: to buy utensils and ingredients for her business.

loans.name: Benkadi   3 Group

texts.fr:
Les 10 membres du groupe  Benkadi 3 sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 40 ans, 4 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles traditionnelles à BOUGOURA, un des villages de la commune de YANGASSO cercle de SAN, 4ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur 5 eme prêt avec l’institution, les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est  l’arachide  avec M’PERE,  1 ère assise  de la droite vers la gauche sur la photo.
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, des semences, des petits matériels agricoles et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir 1,5 hectare. 
La production sera vendue au niveau du village et au marché de Kimparana, après la récolte, à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice  de 125 000FCFA en fin de campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The ten members of the Benkadi 3 group are married women who are, on average, 40 years old with four children each. They all live in traditional families in Bougoura, one of the villages of the Yangasso commune, in the Cercle of San (fourth administrative region of Mali).

They have joined the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso in order to successfully carry out their farming activities during the rainy season. This is their fifth loan with the institution, and their previous loans have been duly repaid.

M'Pere, a member of the group, grows groundnuts. In the photo, she is in the front row, first from the right.

M'Pere plans to use her loan to buy some farm inputs, seeds, small agricultural equipment, and to cover the cost of plowing to maintain 1.5 hectare (3.7 acres) of land.

After the harvest, she will sell her crop in her village and at the Kimparana market, to a customer base consisting of men and women.

She is expecting to make a profit of 125,000 CFA francs at the end of the growing season. This profit will allow her to repay her loan and to help her husband with the daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs, seeds, small agricultural equipment, and to cover the cost of plowing.

loans.name: Roberto Carlos

texts.es:
Roberto tiene 26 años de edad, es soltero. El cliente nació en la zona rural en las faldas de un volcán ,  sus padres son agricultores por tradición familiar.  Él a aprendido las labores del campo relacionadas a los cultivos de subsistencia de la zona ( maíz y frijol );  trabajaba por las mañanas y fines de semana en labores agrícolas y estudiaba en la escuela de su comunidad de tarde la educación básica. Luego se desplazaba en autobús o pick up a la ciudad a estudiar bachillerato y así se pudo graduar de bachiller trabajando y estudiando. 

 Compra los insumos agrícolas en la ciudad, donde los transporta en pick up o en autobús unos 8 kilómetros hasta su casa, luego deben cargarlos en la espalda hasta el lugar de  cultivo de 1 a 1.5 kilómetros  subiendo hasta las partes mas altas del caserío en las faldas del volcán, donde tienen los cultivos de maíz y frijol.  

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación campo, es para comprar  fertilizantes, pesticidas, herbicidas, entre otros insumos para cultivar 0.33 ha de frijol y 0.7 ha de cultivo de maíz blanco ya que la mano de obra la pone él, un hermano menor y su papá.  El crédito le dará la oportunidad de trabajo y al final de la temporada tener algunos ingresos por ventas de granos cosechados y los residuos de cosecha. Ya que el cliente ahora trabaja de forma temporal en un lubricentro en la ciudad  y puede ocuparse de la actividad agrícola junto con su familia.   


 planea en un futuro empezar a construir su casa; su papá le da el espacio donde construir y ya quiere ir adquiriendo algunos muebles y electrodomésticos del hogar por si algún día se casa.
texts.en:
Roberto, 26, is single.  He was born in a rural zone on the skirt of a volcano; his parents work in agriculture as a family tradition.  He learned chores related to work in the fields growing subsistence crops typical of the zone (corn and beans).  He worked mornings and weekends on farm chores and attended primary school in the afternoon.  Later he headed into the city by bus to attend high-school and was able to graduate high-school working and studying at the same time.

He buys his agricultural supplies in the city transporting them by pick-up or bus to his house, a distance of about 8 kilometers.  He must then carry them on his back to his fields that are about 1-1.5 kilometers away rising to the highest parts of the settlement on the skirts of the volcano where he grows corn and beans.

The loan he’s asking Fundación Campo for is to buy fertilizer, pesticide and herbicide, among others, to grow 0.33 hectares of beans and 0.7 of white corn since he, his brother and his father provide the labor.  The loan will provide him with a work opportunity and at the end of the season with some income generated by the sale of harvested grain and harvest leavings.  He works part-time in a lubrication center in the city and can also work in agriculture with his family.  He plans in future to start building his house and he wants to start buying some of the furniture and home appliances for his house in case he gets married someday.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Laura Ximena

texts.es: Laura, es una joven soltera, actualmente vive con su padre, pero están pasando por una difícil situación económica debido a que ella no tiene empleo y, por falta de experiencia laboral le ha quedado difícil encontrar oportunidades de trabajo, además no cuenta con el apoyo de su padre. Laura es una mujer emprendedora, tiene visión y ganas de salir adelante, por lo que se motiva para solicitar su primer ciclo de crédito, el cual invertirá en el pago de un curso de capacitación en Cocina Fusión, ya que le gusta todo lo relacionado con la gastronomía y desea tener más conocimientos para poder tener más oportunidades laborales y así obtener ingresos para satisfacer las necesidades básicas del hogar. Laura sueña con capacitarse y a mediano plazo convertirse en una chef profesional, montar su propio restaurante y tener un excelente equipo de trabajo, que permitan hacer el negocio próspero y poder mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Laura is a young single woman living with her father but they are currently going through a difficult economic situation because she’s unemployed.  Due to her lack of experience she’s found it difficult to find a job and besides she does not get support from her father.  

Laura is an enterprising woman; she’s forward looking and very much wants to get ahead which is what motivates her to request her first loan cycle that she’ll use to pay for a Fusion Cuisine course because she likes everything related to gastronomy and wants to have more skills in order to increase her employment opportunities thus earning income to meet basic household needs. 

Laura dreams with getting training to become a chef in the medium run, to set up her own restaurant and to have an excellent work team that will lead to a successful business so she can improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to pay for a cooking course.

loans.name: Benkadi   4 Group

texts.fr:
Les 10 membres du groupe  Benkadi 4 sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 42 ans, 5 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles traditionnelles à BOUGOURA, un des villages de la commune de YANGASSO cercle de SAN, 4ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur 5 eme prêt avec l’institution, les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est  l’arachide  avec HAWA,  1 ère assise  de la droite vers la gauche sur la photo.
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, des semences, des petits matériels agricoles et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir 0,5 hectare. 
La production sera vendue au niveau du village et au marché de Kimparana, après la récolte, à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice  de 90 000FCFA en fin de campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The ten members of the Benkadi 4 group are married women who are, on average, 42 years old with five children each. They all live in traditional families in Bougoura, one of the villages of the Yangasso commune, in the Cercle of San (fourth administrative region of Mali).

They have joined the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso in order to successfully carry out their farming activities during the rainy season. This is their fifth loan with the institution, and their previous loans have been duly repaid.

Hawa, a member of the group, grows groundnuts. In the photo, she is in the front row, first from the right.

Hawa plans to use her loan to buy some farm inputs, seeds, small agricultural equipment, and to cover the cost of plowing to maintain 0.5 hectare (1.23 acre) of land.

After the harvest, she will sell her crop in her village and at the Kimparana market, to a customer base consisting of men and women.

She is expecting to make a profit of 90,000 CFA francs at the end of the growing season. This profit will allow her to repay her loan and to help her husband with the daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs, seeds, small agricultural equipment, and to cover the cost of plowing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of grains, plates and bowls

loans.name: Paulina

texts.en:
After graduating junior secondary school, Paulina decided to set up her own ‘Kenkey’ selling business (Kenkey is a traditional Ghanaian staple dish that is made from corn dough and is wrapped in banana leaves).  She prepares her ‘Kenkey’ on her own and proceeds to sell it in Akatakyiwa (near Cape Coast). With over 2 years worth of experience, she is currently looking to expand her enterprise further. Unfortunately, she is limited due to a lack of funding.

As a result, this loan will be used to help her purchase more maize, thus enabling her to prepare and sell more of her tasty ‘Kenkey’. She aims at using the profits from her business to help support her husband (who is a carpenter) with the upkeep of their house, whilst ensuring that their 2 children are able to experience a better life.

loans.use: to help her purchase more maize, thus enabling her to prepare and sell more of her tasty ‘Kenkey’

loans.name: Sulma

texts.es: Sulma tiene 39 años, está divorciada y vive en su propia casa junta su único hijo de 13 años.  Sulma se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al sombrío de palma aceitera, pues lo ha visto como un negocio sumadamente rentable, para eso cuenta con un terreno de 20 hectáreas, dedicándose a esta actividad desde hace 03 años. Le gusta esta actividad por ha visto que le resulta bastante rentable pues tiene un buen precio en el mercado actual, logrando generarse buenas ganancias. Viendo los buenos resultados tiene planes de ampliar su negocio. Esto será su primer préstamo  con Kiva. Por ello espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Con el monto de 1000 nuevos soles los invertirá en la compra de abono orgánico  para el proceso de cosecha de sus parcelas de palma aceitera.
texts.en: Sulma, 39, is divorced living in her own house with her only son who is 13-years-old.  Sulma works in agriculture, specifically in the shade of palm oil trees because she’s seen this as a very profitable business.  She has 20 hectares and has been in this business for the last three years.  She likes this activity because it’s been quite profitable because the current market price is good so she earns good profits.  Seeing the good results she’s having, she’d like to expand the business.  This will be her first Kiva loan so she’s hoping for your collaboration to reach her goals.  She will use the 1,000 new soles to buy organic manure for the growing process on her parcels of palm oil trees.

loans.use: to buy organic manure.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to increase her existing rice and maize capacity.

loans.name: Erla

texts.es: Erla, de 60 años, está casada y tiene 8 hijos adultos. Vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo y su último hijo. Erla se dedica a la agricultura, tiene 3 hectáreas de terreno sembradas con plátano de las variedades mas solicitadas. Gracias a la buena ubicación de su parcela y a la buena carretera de su pueblo, toda su producción es vendida en su mismo terreno ya que hasta ahí llegan los compradores guiados por la calidad orgánica de los racimos que obtiene. Realiza la cosecha cada 21 días, trabaja con ayuda de su esposo y de algunos de sus hijos. Lleva en esta actividad cerca de 12 años. También siembra maíz y cacao aunque en menor proporción. Comenta que le agrada su vida de campo pues le ha traído muchas alegrías como los ingresos económicos que obtiene de sus ventas. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 4000 soles y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. El monto solicitado lo invertirá en la compra de cajas de madera que usa para el empaquetado de los plátanos, también comprará herramientas de cosecha y alquilará una hectárea más de terreno para continuar sembrando.
texts.en:
Erla, 60, is married and has 8 adult children.  She lives in her own house with her husband and youngest son.  Erla works in agriculture.  She has three hectares planted with the most sought-after varieties of bananas.  

Thanks to the good management of her parcel and the good highway into town, she sells her entire production at her parcel because buyers come there guided by the organic quality of the banana bunches she obtains.  She harvests every 21 days and works with help from her husband and some of her children.  

She’s been in this activity for nearly 12 years.  She also grows corn and cocoa beans but in less amount.  She comments that she likes life in the countryside because it’s brought her much joy like the income she gets from her sales.

On this occasion she will request 4,000 soles and she feels grateful for the financial support she’ll get to continue forward.  She also commits to make her payments punctually.  She will use the requested amount to buy wood crates that will be used to pack the bananas and will also buy work tools and will lease another hectare of land to continue planting.

loans.use: to buy wood crates, work tools and to lease farm land.

loans.name: Beijing Group

texts.es: El Banco de emprendimiento BEIJING está  compuesto por ocho integrantes, seis mujeres y dos varones, ,  la presidenta del banco es la Sra. Lilian tiene 26 años casada con dos  hijos, ella se dedica a la  venta de comida en su puesto de venta que se encuentra   en su mismo domicilio que es por la zona de Cala Cala,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Lilian utilizara este préstamo para la compra de insumos para la elaboración de comida como papa, arroz y fideo al por mayor  y así de esta manera mejorar sus ventas e incrementar su capital de trabajo su razón para solicitar este préstamo es la falta de capital para la compra de insumos, la Sra. Lilian va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando cantidad de insumos,  su deseo de la Sra. Lilian es crecer en su negocio, es una persona trabajadora se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo que le brindan en la otorgación del crédito.
texts.en: The “Beijing” communal bank consists of 8 members, six women and two men.  The bank’s president is Lilian, 26, who is married with two children.  She works selling food in her sales stand located at home in the Cala Cala zone.  This loan is her first sequence in the institution and Lilian will use it to buy ingredients like potatoes, rice and noodles at wholesale to prepare the food so sales and her working capital will increase.  Her reason for requesting the loan is her lack of capital to buy the supplies.  Lilian will use profits to continue buying amounts of supplies.  Her wish is to make the business grow.  She’s a hardworking woman who feels happy and grateful to the institution for the support they provide by granting the loan.

loans.use: to buy food-making ingredients.

loans.name: Angela

texts.es: Angela tiene 44 años de edad, es casada, tiene nueve hijos y ella vive en el municipio Protección, Santa Barbará. Siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura  de café, Maíz, Frijol y Plátano. Cuenta con  mucha  experiencia  en  cultivar estos productos. El préstamo que doña Angela solicito es por L.20,000, el cual los invertirá en el Mantenimiento de la finca de café, comprara fertilizantes y para limpieza de la finca y poder salir adelante en el trabajo y con más facilidad para mantener en buen estado su cultivo. Su meta es  seguir creciendo como agricultora.
texts.en: Ángela, 44, is married with nine children; she lives in Protección, Santa Bárbara.  She’s always worked as a coffee, corn, bean and banana grower.  She has much experience growing these products.  The loan Ángela requested is for 20,000 Lempiras that she’ll invest in her coffee crop; she will buy fertilizer and do the weeding so she can get ahead with the work more easily to keep her crop in good conditions.  Her goal is to continue growing as a farmer.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Las Fronteras Group

texts.es: El Banco de emprendimiento LAS FRONTERAS está  compuesto por ocho integrantes, seis mujeres y dos varones,  el presidente del banco es el Sr. Fernando tiene 23 años,  su actividad económica es venta frutas según a la temporada, se dedica a esta actividad hace poco tiempo, el tiene su puesto de venta que se encuentra en la localidad de Quebrada Seca el destino del crédito es para la compra fruta de la temporada por mayor para surtir su puesto de venta, el Sr. Fernando es una persona trabajadora, ya que esta es única fuente de ingresos, se siente agradecida con la institución por el apoyo que se le ha brindado,  el deseo el Sr. Fernando es tener una tienda donde pueda ofrecer variedad de productos como también incrementar su clientela para generar mayores ingresos económicos, en la foto uno de los integrantes se encuentra acompañado de su hermana.
texts.en:
The LAS FRONTERAS community bank is made up of 8 members, six women and two men. The president of the bank is Fernando who is 23 years old. His business is the sale of seasonal fruits and he has been doing this for a little while. He has a stall which is located in Quebrada Seca. The loan will be used  to buy seasonal fruit wholesale to supply his fruit stall.

Fernando is a hard working person and this is his only source of income. He is grateful to the institution for the support he has been given. His dream is to have a shop where he can offer a range of products as well as increase his clientele in order to have a better income.

In the photo one of the members is shown with his sister.

loans.use: to buy seasonal fruit.

loans.name: Alexis Manrique

texts.es:
Alexis tiene 29 años de edad, es soltero.  Tiene 8 años trabajando en la administración de agua potable, posee mucha experiencia, tarea que la aprendió de sus compañeros de trabajo; ya que al terminar el bachillerato ingreso a trabajar en la bomba de agua antes de trabajar ahí era estudiante.  Se levanta todos los días a las 4:00 a.m. para prepararse e irse a su trabajo, entra a las 7:00 a.m, y camina a pie 40 minutos para llegar.


El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar arena, bloque, cemento y pago de  mano de obra y construir una habitación, porque piensa en un futuro tener su propia familia. Al tener construido su habitación estará mucho mas cómodo, ya que su casa es pequeña y siente que no tiene su espacio, a la misma vez ya tener un lugar donde compartir con su esposa.

Desea seguir trabajando fuerte para honrar la deuda que adquirió con la Fundacion Campo y así poder sacar un nuevo préstamo y mejor toda su casa.
texts.en:
Alexis is 29 years old and unmarried.  He has been working for the water utility company for eight years. He has a lot of experience and has learned a good deal from his work colleagues. Before starting his job at the water company, he completed his high school degree. He gets up every day at 4 a.m. to get ready for work. He starts work at 7 a.m. and walks 40 minutes to get there.

He is requesting this loan from Fundación Campo to buy sand, cinder blocks, and cement and pay labor costs to build a room on his house because he plans to have his own family in the future. Once he has built the extra room, he will be much more comfortable, since his house is very small and he feels that he doesn't have enough space. It will also give him a place to share with his wife.

He plans to keep working hard to pay off his debt to Fundación Campo so he can take out another loan and do improvements on his whole house.

loans.use: to buy sand, cinder blocks, and cement and pay labor costs to build a room on his house.

loans.name: Maynor Yuvany

texts.es: Maynor, tiene 30 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposa con quien tiene dos hijos, reside en una aldea del municipio de Protección, Santa Bárbara.  El lleva más de 10 años de experiencia en la agricultura. Sus cultivos son de maíz, frijoles y café, esta producción la vende en el mercado local de la zona. El préstamo que ha solicitado es por 10,000 lempiras y los va invertir en la compra de fertilizantes para poderle dar mantenimiento a su finca de café. Su plan es mejorar la cosecha y ser un buen productor de la zona.
texts.en: Maynor is 30 years old. He lives in a common law marriage with his wife with whom he has 2 children. They live in a village in the municipal of Protección, Santa Bárbara. He has more than 10 years of experience in agriculture. His crops are corn, beans and coffee. He sells the produce in the local market of the area. The loan that he is requesting is for 10,000 lempiras, or $500 USD, which he will invest in the purchase of fertilizers to do maintenance on his coffee farm. His plan is to improve the harvest and be a good producer in the area.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers to be able to do maintenance on his coffee farm.

loans.name: Maximiliana

texts.es: Maximiliana vive junto con su familia en la hermosa ciudad de Paucartambo en el departamento del Cusco, ella tiene 39 años de edad y es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene cinco hijos a quienes saca adelante, ella alterna las actividades del hogar con la venta frutas y granos secos entonces ella lleva los granos sacos al valle de Kosñipata después distribuye a diferentes revendedoras y luego ella regresa a Paucartambo trayendo frutas como por ejemplo piña, naranjas, plátanos, etc. Ya son varios años que se dedica a  este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Mamacha Carmen” y esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar frutas para incrementar el capital del negocio. Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en: Maximiliana lives with her family in the beautiful city of Paucartambo in the departament of Cusco. She is 39 years old and married; she and her wonderful husband have five children to help get ahead in life. In addition to her duties around the home, she sells fruits and dried grains, which she transports to the Kosñipata Valley and distributes to different vendors before returning to Paucartambo with fruits such as pineapples, oranges, bananas, and so on. She has been in this business for several years and it is going very well thanks to her hard work. She belongs to the Mamacha Carmen village bank, and currently needs this loan to buy fruit to increase her working capital. She is grateful for the loan and committed to making her monthly payments on time and in full.

loans.use: to buy fruit.

loans.name: Zainab

texts.ru: Зайнаб 53 года. Она замужняя женщина, имеющая пятерых детей. Зайнаб проживает в районе Дж.Руми в южной части Таджикистана. Она вместе с мужем занимается выращиванием сельскохозяйственной культуры, а также разведением коров для домашнего хозяйства. Недавно дочь Зайнаб у портнихи их села научилась кройке и шитью, и теперь она самостоятельно может шить национальные женские платья. В данный момент ей необходима швейная машинка, чтобы начать собственное дело. Мать хочет поддержать дочь в открытии швейного дела и поэтому обратилась за кредитом. На сумму кредита Зайнаб собирается купить дочери компьютерную швейную машинку. В их селе услуга швеи всегда в спросе, так как девушки и женщины часто обращаются к ним для шитья платья. Прибыль с деятельности Зайнаб собирается откладывать на свадьбу самой дочери.
texts.en: Zainab is 53 years old.  She is a married woman with five children.  Zainab lives in the J. Rumy district, in the southern part of Tajikistan.  She and her husband are involved in growing agricultural crops and also in breeding cattle for their household.  Recently, Zainab's daughter learned sewing from a seamstress in their village and now can independently sew women's national dresses.  At the present time, she needs a sewing machine in order to start her own business.  The mother wants to support her daughter in opening the sewing business and, therefore, requested a loan.  Zainab plans to use the loan to buy her daugher a computerized sewing machine.  Seamstresses are always in demand in their village because young women and women often come to them for making dresses.  Zainab plans to save the profit from the business for her daughter's wedding.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine for her daughter to start a sewing business

loans.name: Sofia

texts.es: Sofía, de 35 años de edad, está casada y tiene 3 hijos con quienes vive en su casa propia. Sofía se dedica a la carpintería, desarrolla esta labor en un taller que ha instalado en su vivienda hace 3 años, aunque ya tiene 20 años de experiencia en este rubro. Compra la madera que necesita y luego traslada esta materia prima a su punto de trabajo en donde elabora muebles para el hogar y las oficinas de su localidad. Gracias a los años que lleva trabajando ha podido consolidar su clientela y generar buenos ingresos económicos para su familia. Del mismo modo, al no existir otro negocio similar en su sector, sus ventas están aseguradas. Trabaja con ayuda de su cónyuge. Le gusta su actividad  porque puede estar en su casa el tiempo necesario para cumplir con el cuidado de sus hijos. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 500 soles y agradece el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado comprará un motor nuevo que necesita para el funcionamiento de las maquinarias que usa en su taller de carpintería.
texts.en:
Sofía is 35 years old and is married with 3 children who she lives with in her own house. Sofía earns a living from carpentry. She works in a workshop which she installed at her home 3 years ago, although she already has 20 years' experience in the trade. She buys the wood she needs and then takes the raw material to her workplace where she makes furniture for the home and for the offices in the area. Due to the many years she has been working she has been able to build up her clientele and generate a good income for her family. At the same time, since there are no other similar businesses in the area, her sales are guaranteed. She works with the help of her husband. She likes her work because it enables her to be at home for enough time to be able to look after her children. 

She is currently asking for a loan of S/. 500 soles and is grateful for the financial support she is getting to be able to make progress. She is also committed to paying her loan instalments punctually. She will use the requested sum of money to buy a motor which she needs for one of the machines which she uses in her carpentry workshop.

loans.use: to buy a motor for one of the machines which she uses in her carpentry workshop.

loans.name: Benkadi  6 Group

texts.fr:
Les 6 membres du groupe  Benkadi 6 sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 40 ans,5 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles traditionnelles à BOUGOURA, un des villages de la commune de YANGASSO cercle de SAN, 4ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur 5 eme prêt avec l’institution, les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est  l’arachide  avec DJELIKA ,  1 ère débout  de la gauche vers la droite sur la photo.
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, des semences, des petits matériels agricoles et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir 1,5 hectare. 
La production sera vendue au niveau du village et au marché de Kimparana, après la récolte, à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice de 160 000FCFA en fin de campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The six members of the Benkadi 6 group are married women who are, on average, 40 years old with five children each. They all live in traditional families in Bougoura, one of the villages of the Yangasso commune, in the Cercle of San (fourth administrative region of Mali).

They have joined the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso in order to successfully carry out their farming activities during the rainy season. This is their fifth loan with the institution, and their previous loans have been duly repaid.

Djelika, a member of the group, grows groundnuts. In the photo, she is in the standing row, first from the left.

Djelika plans to use her loan to buy some farm inputs, seeds, small agricultural equipment, and to cover the cost of plowing to maintain 1.5 hectare (3.7 acres) of land.

After the harvest, she will sell her crop in her village and at the Kimparana market, to a customer base consisting of men and women.

She is expecting to make a profit of 160,000 CFA francs at the end of the growing season. This profit will allow her to repay her loan and to help her husband with the daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs, seeds and small agricultural equipment, and to cover the cost of plowing.

loans.name: Benkadi   5 Group

texts.fr:
Les 7 membres du groupe  Benkadi 5 sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 42 ans, 4 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles traditionnelles à BOUGOURA, un des villages de la commune de YANGASSO cercle de SAN, 4ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur 5 eme prêt avec l’institution, les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est  l’arachide  avec SETOU,  1 ère débout  de la gauche vers la droite sur la photo.
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, des semences, des petits matériels agricoles et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir 1,5 hectare. 
La production sera vendue au niveau du village et au marché de Kimparana, après la récolte, à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice  de 170 000FCFA en fin de campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The seven members of the Benkadi 5 group are married women who are, on average, 42 years old with four children each. They all live in traditional families in Bougoura, one of the villages of the Yangasso commune, in the Cercle of San (fourth administrative region of Mali).

They have joined the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso in order to successfully carry out their farming activities during the rainy season. This is their fifth loan with the institution, and their previous loans have been duly repaid.

Setou, a member of the group, grows groundnuts. In the photo, she is in the standing row, first from the left.

Setou plans to use her loan to buy some farm inputs, seeds, small agricultural equipment, and to cover the cost of plowing to maintain 1.5 hectare (3.7 acres) of land.

After the harvest, she will sell her crop in her village and at the Kimparana market, to a customer base consisting of men and women.

She is expecting to make a profit of 170,000 CFA francs at the end of the growing season. This profit will allow her to repay her loan and to help her husband with the daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs, seeds, small agricultural equipment, and to cover the cost of plowing.

loans.name: Solidaridad De Jicamarca Group

texts.es: La Sra. Lilian de 35 años de edad casada  y madre de 2 hijos, la Sra. Lilian  tiene una pequeña bodega  ya hace unos  5  años. La Sra. Lilian ha llegado a fidelizar  a sus clientes el cual le ha generado ganancias para poder cubrir los gastos de su hogar,  En el futuro le gustaría tener un local propio donde poder vender sus productos y obtener mayores ganancias económicas. Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá en comprar más productos(azucar, leche,arroz,etc) para su bodega  y así seguir satisfaciendo las necesidades de sus clientes  y así poder salir adelante. A la vez  la Sra. Lilian y todos los integrantes se encuentran  agradecidos  con Kiva  por el préstamo otorgado  y por la confianza que se  les ha sido brindada. La Sra. Lilian  Esta sentada en el medio se le distingue por el polo manga larga de color azul ,Se despide  Dejando la promesa  que cumplirá todas sus metas propuestas.
texts.en:
Lilian, 35, is married and mother of two children.  She’s had a small store for about five years now.  She’s managed to secure regular customers that produce profits for her to cover her household expenses.  In future, she’d like to have a space of her own in which to sell her products and earn profits.  With the granted loan she will buy more products (sugar, milk, rice, etc.) for her store to continue satisfying customer needs and get ahead that way.  
Lilian and all the group members are grateful to Kiva for the granted loan and for the trust placed in them.  Lilian is seated in the middle and can be recognized by her long-sleeve blue shirt.  She says goodbye promising that she’ll reach all her set goals.

loans.use: to buy more stock merchandise for the store.

loans.name: Shukur

texts.ru: Шукур молодой и добродушный парень в возрасте 27 лет. Он женат и имеет двоих детей. Шукур очень трудолюбивый и он очень любит свою семью. Он старается, чтобы его семья не нуждалась ни в чем. Для того, чтобы иметь постоянный доход в семье, он занимается собственным бизнесом. Шукур занимается производством и продажей мебели. Для этого у него имеется собственный мебельный цех. Данный бизнес он начал уже более двух лет назад. Жена его не работает, она сидит дома и занимается воспитанием детей. Так как их дети ещё совсем маленькие, за ними нужен хороший уход. Шукур уже неоднократно брал кредит для реализации своего бизнеса. Он пополняет свой ассортимент изготавливаемой мебели. На сегодня он имеет много постоянных клиентов, а также заказов из других городов. Данный бизнес приносит Шукуру хороший доход, но потребности  его семьи увеличиваются и ему необходимо получать больше дохода. Сейчас Шукур хочет закупить больше сырья для производства мебели, чтобы расширить свой бизнес. Поэтому он обратился в Арванд и желает получить кредит на покупку сырья для производства мебели. Шукур надеется на поддержку и заранее благодарит Арванд.
texts.en: Shukur is a young and kind 27 year-old young man.  He is married and has two children.  Shukur is very hardworking and loves his family very much.  He tries to make sure that his family does not have any needs.  He is involved in his own business to have a regular income in the family.  Shukur is involved in manufacturing and selling furniture.  He owns a furniture workshop for this purpose.  He started this business over two years ago.  His wife does not work; she stays home and raises the children.  Because their children are still very small, they need good care.  Shukur had previously obtained loans for his business several times.  He adds to his selection of made furniture.  Today, he has many regular customers and also orders from other cities.  This business yields a good income for Shukur, but his family's needs are increasing and he needs to earn more money.  Now Shukur wants to buy more raw materials for making furniture in order to expand his business.  This is why he came to Arvand and wishes to obtain a loan to buy raw materials for marking furniture.  Shukur hopes for the support and thanks Arvand in advance.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for making furniture in order to expand his business

loans.name: Sergio

texts.es: El señor Sergio, es una persona de 28 años de edad de estado civil soltero alcanzo estudiar hasta la primaria, vive con su conyugue y su pequeño hijo en su casa propia que se halla situado en la comunidad de Tiraque, tiene un dependiente económico a cargo el cual es su pequeño hijo , la actividad principal a la que se dedica es la agricultura produce;  Papa 40 cargas, Arveja  140 arrobas, Maíz 40 cargas. La siembra de estos cultivos los realiza en sus terrenos propios que están ubicados en la misma localidad, los trabajos agrícolas los realiza con la colaboración  de sus vecinos, vive en una casa rustica de adobe, con este préstamo pagara el saldo por el terreno donde cultiva, gracias al crédito mejorara sus condiciones económicos y por tanto también la calidad de vida de sus dependientes.
texts.en: Sergio, 28, is single living with his wife and small son in his own house located in Tiraque; he managed to complete primary education.  He has one economic dependent, his little son.  His main activity is agriculture; he produces 40 loads of potato, 140 sack-fulls of peas and 40 loads of corn.  He grows these products on his own land located in the same locality.  He does his agricultural chores with collaboration from his neighbors.  He lives in a rustic adobe house.  He will use this loan to pay off the parcel of land he farms.  Thanks to the loan he will improve his economic condition and therefore also his dependents’ quality of life.

loans.use: to buy farmland.

loans.name: Gabriel

texts.es: Gabriel, tiene 32 años de edad, es casado, tiene dos hijos, vive en una aldea del municipio de protección, Santa Bárbara. Gabriel siempre ha trabajado en la agricultura ayudando a su padre. Hace 4 años que inicio con sus propios cultivos de maíz, frijoles y café. De los ingresos que obtiene cubre las necesidades básicas del hogar. Ha decidido por un préstamo de 10,000 Lempiras para comprar fertilizantes para el cultivo de maíz y frijoles, con el objetivo de mejorar la producción. Su plan es mejorar el nivel de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Gabriel is 32 years old, is married, and has two children. He lives in a small town in Santa Bárbara. 

Gabriel has always worked in agriculture helping his father. Four years ago, he started growing corn, beans, and coffee on his own. The money that he obtains covers his household's basic necessities.

He has decided to take out a loan of 10,000 Lempiras to buy fertilizers for the cultivation of corn and beans, with the goal of improving production. His plan is to improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for the cultivation of corn and beans to improve production.

loans.name: Assurance De Phaeton 1, 2 & 3 Group

texts.fr:
Jaccint est le coordinateur de son groupe Assurance de Phaeton. Il habite dans la région de Phaeton où de l’éléctricité est rare et de l’eau est très limité. Jaccint a dirigé son commerce de poisson pendant les 9 et demi dernières années. Il est marie il a 4 enfants.

Jaccint voudrait utiliser cet emprunt d'investir dans l'achat de poisson. Jaccint espère que cet emprunt l’aidera à agrandir son entreprise Des autres membres Assurance ont besoin d’un emprunt pour tels commerces comme charbon, vetements usees et produits alimentaires.
texts.en:
Jaccint is the coordinator of his group "Assurance de Phaeton".  He lives in the region of Phaeton where electricity is scarce and the water supply very limited.  He has been running his own fish-selling business for 9 and a half years.  He is married and has four children.

Jaccint would like to use this loan to buy some fish.  He hopes that this loan will help him to increase his business.  

Other members of the "Assurance" group will use their part of the loan to boost their own businesses: charcoal sales, used clothing and food products.

loans.use: to buy fish.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to cover start-up costs paying for business registration and equipment for her customer service business

loans.name: Fernanda

texts.es: Fernanda es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia ella tiene 54 años edad y tiene tres hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de verduras, granos secos y crianza de animales menores como cuyes, ella compra de diferentes agricultores de Paucartambo verduras como por ejemplo cebollas, zanahorias, repollo, habas, tomates y otros para luego llevarlos y  repartirlos en el valle de Kosñipata entonces al terminar de repartir y vender con el nuevo capital  ella compra frutas para después distribuirlo a diferentes revendedoras del mercado de Paucartambo. Ya son varios años que se dedica a  este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Mamacha Carmen” y esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar productos secos y frutas. Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Fernanda’s a hardworking, enterprising, 54-year-old woman who supports her family; she has three children.  She works selling vegetables and dry grains and also raises small animals like guinea pigs.  

She buys vegetables like onions, carrots, cabbage, lima beans, tomatoes and others from various growers in Paucartambo and then takes them to sell them in Kosñipata Valley.  When she finishes distributing and selling them she uses the new capital to buy fruit to then distribute among retailers in the Paucartambo market.  She’s been in this business for several years now and does very well thanks to the effort she puts into her work.

She belongs to the “Mamacha Carmen” communal bank and on this occasion needs the loan to buy dry goods and fruit.  She is grateful for and values the loan and commits to make her monthly payments very responsibly.

loans.use: to buy dry goods and fruit.

loans.name: Laafilabumb De Yagma Group

texts.fr:
Mme W.COLETTE est la représentante du groupe LAAFILABUMB DE YAGMA. Mme se porte bien.  Elle est mariée et mère de 02 enfants. Le plus âgé a 06ans le moins âgé a 04ans. 01 va à l’école.
Mme vend des plats en plastique. Elle exerce ce métier depuis  05ans. Elle s’approvisionne au marché  de Secteur 10 et au grand marché. Ses clients sont les femmes et hommes.
Mme veut  s’acheter  01 douzaine de gobelet et 02 douzaines  de plats et 01douzaine de bouillards.
Elle  épargne  ses bénéfices  afin de renforcer  son activité. Mme ambitionne agrandir  son  activité  et subvenir aux  besoins  de sa famille.
texts.en:
W. Colette is the representative of the group "Laafilabumb de Yagma".  She is doing well.  She is married and the mother of two children.  Her oldest child is 6 years old and the youngest is 4.  One of her children goes to school.

W. Colette sells plastic dishes and has been involved in this activity for five years.  She stocks up at the District 10 market and at the Grand Market.  She resells to both men and women.

She wants to buy one dozen cups, two dozen large plates and one dozen kettles.

She saves her profits in order to boost her business.  Her goal is to expand her activity and to meet her family's needs.

loans.use: to buy one dozen cups, two dozen large plates and one dozen kettles.

loans.name: Crimaldo

texts.es: Crimaldo, de 39 años de edad, esta casado y tiene 5 hijos pero solo vive con tres de ellos en su casa propia. La actividad que realiza Crimaldo es la agricultura, para eso cuenta con un terreno de una hectárea que alquila en el área donde vive. En la actualidad toda esta área está sembrada con plátano y realiza la venta de sus productos en el mercado principal de su localidad o en diversas ferias organizadas por la Municipalidad de su comunidad. Trabaja con ayuda de su esposa quien lo apoya en las labores de siembra y mantenimiento de las plantas hasta la cosecha y venta de los productos. Le gusta su trabajo de campo por el aire puro que percibe del medio ambiente además se siente muy satisfecho con los ingresos económicos que su labor le genera y que son útiles para pagar los gastos básicos de su hogar y la educación de sus hijos, aunque desearía tener mayores ganancias monetarias. Tiene planeado ampliar su negocio e incursionar en un nuevo proyecto de siembra de cacao por el auge que tiene este cultivo en su localidad. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 1000, por tanto agradece la oportunidad que le brindan para acceder al crédito que necesita para continuar con el logro de sus metas. El monto solicitado lo invertirá en la compra de abono orgánico para la siembra de plátanos.
texts.en:
Crimaldo, 39, is married with five children but only three of them still live at home with him.  The activity Crimaldo does is agriculture and to do so he leases a hectare where he lives. It’s currently entirely planted with bananas and he sells his products in the main local market or in various street markets organized by his local municipality.  His wife helps him do the planting and crop maintenance chores until harvest and selling of products.
